hero.subtitle: Train at home with intelligent camera support. Rehand analyzes your posture live, guides you through exercise steps, and automatically measures progress — no guessing and safe for the entire body.

features.title: Advanced features for modern physiotherapy
features.subtitle: Camera + AI guide you step by step, and results save automatically.

taskManagement.title: AI-guided sessions
taskManagement.description: Rehand gives live guidance and smoothly leads you through each exercise step.

roleBasedAccess.title: Position calibration
roleBasedAccess.description: Quickly set distance and framing for precise and safe correction.

photoVerification.title: Full-body exercise library
photoVerification.description: From spine mobility to shoulder and hip stability — with clear pass thresholds.

analytics.title: Weekly goals
analytics.description: Set your weekly minutes target and track progress in real time.

administration.title: Achievements and streak
administration.description: Badges for first workouts, day streaks and milestones.

timeTracking.title: Stats and reports
timeTracking.description: Completed exercises, total time, rounds and progress — all in your profile.

features8.title: Immediate effects thanks to personalization
features8.subtitle: Everything you need to exercise correctly and consistently.

secure.title: Technique control = fewer errors
secure.description: Live feedback corrects limb positioning and pace — accuracy over guessing.

fast.title: Results in minutes
fast.description: After a session, see a summary of steps and time — real progress at a glance.

analytics.title: Reports at a click
analytics.description: Clear charts and summaries without manual logging.

safety.title: Constant motivation

testimonials.title: What our users say
testimonials.subtitle: Voices from physiotherapists and beta participants.

testimonial1.quote: Rehand helps my patients keep correct technique between visits. With position calibration and live cues, patients get correction exactly when they move, which noticeably accelerates therapeutic effects.
testimonial1.name: Dr. Martha Kowalczyk

testimonial2.quote: Camera calibration and live guidance shorten the learning curve. I see fewer compensations and patients achieve correct patterns faster, making it easier to progress to more advanced exercises.
testimonial2.name: MSc Peter King

testimonial3.quote: After a week I feel less lower back pain and better mobility. I like that the app shows progress after every session and reminds me of weekly goals — it really keeps me consistent.
testimonial3.name: Anna, 29

testimonial4.quote: Post-session reports make my therapy planning easier. I get a quick summary of completed movements, duration and challenging elements, so I can precisely tailor the next home exercises.
testimonial4.name: Dr. Paul Lee

testimonial5.quote: Weekly goals keep me consistent. Even on busy days, short rounds and clear pass thresholds help me stay on track and see real progress.
testimonial5.name: Michael, 35

testimonial6.quote: The full-body exercise library is clear and well guided.
testimonial6.name: Alex Nowak

testimonial7.quote: I train at home in the evening and finally see progress.
testimonial7.name: Kate, 42

testimonial9.quote: After 2 weeks my knee hurts less and range of motion is better.
testimonial9.name: Bart, 31

testimonial10.quote: The app clearly shows range of motion and pace. It helps me educate patients, and helps them self-correct patterns at home.
testimonial10.name: Dr. Joanna Szymanska

testimonial11.quote: After a shoulder injury I recovered faster than expected. Short sessions every other day and clear feedback made the difference.
testimonial11.name: Lucas, 38

testimonial12.quote: With neuro patients, repeatability and safety are crucial. Rehand enables both at home without compromise.
testimonial12.name: MSc Natalie Kurek

cta.title: Ready for a smarter AI-powered workout?
cta.subtitle: Start your 14‑day free trial today. No credit card required.

footer.description: Rehand AI is an intelligent home physiotherapy assistant. It analyzes your posture live, guides you through exercise steps, and automatically tracks progress — no guessing, safe for your whole body.
